description: A professional services under PASS-SA to conduct a PKI-Audit as stated in RFP’s Statement of Work.
full_summary:
# Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

**Project Title**: PKI Audit - Professional Audit Support Services Supply Arrangement (PASS) Stream 3

## Overview

A Department of National Defence/Canadian Armed Forces (DND/CAF) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for professional audit services to conduct a PKI audit as per the Statement of Work (SOW) under the Professional Audit Support Services Supply Arrangement (PASS). This requirement is open to PASS Supply Arrangement holders who are pre-qualified for services in the National Capital Region (NCR) in the Information Technology and Systems Audit (ITSA) category, specifically Level 3.

## Details

*   **Reference Number**: W3330-24-149
*   **Closing Date**: November 24, 2023, at 14:00 EST
*   **Estimated Delivery Date**: March 30, 2024
*   **Contract Duration**: Award date to March 30, 2024
*   **Trade Agreements**: WTO-AGP, CFTA, CCFTA, CPFTA, CColFTA, CPanFTA, CETA, Canada-Korea FTA, Canada-Honduras FTA, CUFTA, CPTPP

## Requirements

The requirement solicits proposals for a professional services contract to conduct a PKI audit. The audit must comply with RFC 3647 and practicable CPS.

## Contracting Authority

*   **Name**: ADM (IM)/CIO
*   **Email Address**: IMBIDS.OFFRESGI@forces.gc.ca

## Funding

*   **Authorization**: Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

## Contact

*   **Name**: Jawwad Rashid
*   **Email Address**: IMBIDS.OFFRESGI@forces.gc.ca
*   **Phone**: (613) 601-8431

## Procedure

Inquiries regarding this RFP should be submitted to the contracting authority. Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly from the contracting authority to qualified supply arrangement holders. Bidders are reminded that "Buyandsell.gc.ca" is not responsible for the distribution of solicitation documents. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language.
